page.title: 05National Gypsy Council
page.content: {National Gypsy Education Council.}The Romany people left India about 1000 years ago.Some reached W. Europe in 13th century.Since then they have spread all over the world.Today almost all British Travellers use one or both of the secret languages:English Romani or Celtic Gammon(Shelta).In 1966 the Gypsy Councol founded and linked all Travellers regardless of ethnic origin demanding equal rights to education,work and housing.Cardiff City has honoured that right and provided both a home and education for the travellers in our area.Original site of Travellers' camp is adjacent to the seawall on the foreshore.This piece of wasteground is due to be cleared and the Travellers are to be moved into a new site adjacent which provides modern health amenities for each family.
